name: Roll On (Prototype 1)
description:
This is an early prototype of a progressing game.

Thanks to Brackeys, for a large part of this game's inspiration - the game will be much more unique in the future.

Controls:

Use "a" and "d" to move left and right respectively. 

The mouse can be used to begin and end the game.

To be added in Prototype 2:

  • SFX
  • BGM
  • Ball Character
  • Fix platform bugs + better transitions
  • Better physics/speed
  • Recolouring
  • Better Level design
